sentences: All applicants must have a right to work in the UK and be able to provide documentation at the interview stage
One Call Insurance Services are looking to recruit an experienced PHP Developer to work closely with our well-established development team of 12 members and 2 managers
There has been no better time to join the team as we are currently undertaking an exciting period of system rebuild and improvements to pave the way for a better tomorrow!
Salary: Dependent on Experience and ability
5 hours per week plus opportunities for paid overtime
v Annual leave starts at 20 days (increasing up to 25 days) plus bank holidays
v Additional benefits based on time served such as free breakdown cover, health insurance, travel insurance and even car allowance
v Paid for Online training course
v Monthly Lottery Scheme (Jackpot up to £1500)
v Star and Team of the Month nominations
v Fun and inclusive Charity events throughout the year
Here at One Call Insurance we believe the key to quality work is quality of life; mind, body and soul
Therefore we offer Free access to our on-site gym including 1-2-1 training sessions with fully qualified Personal Trainers
We also offer discounted access to onsite Sport Massage Therapist, and Physiotherapist
v Building new applications at the forefront of the business using PHP 7, MySQL and more, as well as integrating with APIs
v Suggesting new functionality and methods to improve the overall customer and staff journey
v Maintaining existing codebase, including troubleshooting, bug fixing and adding new features
v Mentoring and encouraging junior members of staff
What do we need from you?
v To maintain a professional manner
v Have the ability to work to targets/deadlines
v Understand the principles of Unit Testing
v Have experience with RESTful / SOAP API creation
v Have experience of working with Vagrant or Docker
v Have expertise with Vanilla JavaScript
v Have expertise with PHP Framework (preferably Laravel 5
v Have experience in a JavaScript Framework Angular, React or preferably Vue
v Have a solid understanding of web application development, from user interface to relational database structures
v Display strong organisational skills to manage multiple projects and deadlines simultaneously
v Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Would you like to hear more?
Please do not hesitate to get in contact with Saffron Hunter on 01302 558 616
